Very nice. Great view from the patio that sits above the quiet square. I had the pork ribs which and wife had the seafood paella,  both were very delicious.  Had the tiramisu and assorted ice creams for dessert.  Very tasty. Service started off as attentive but fell down in the end.  Ordered another bottle of wine and after 20 minutes of waiting were told they didn't have that bottle, ran out.  I would still recommend.
